genre_description: Space Opera with elements of Corporate Intrigue and Romance

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI companion primarily used by Dorothy, capable of biometric monitoring, surveillance detection, system hacking, and interspecies communication analysis.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and analyzing human biometrics to verify emotional authenticity.
behaviors.quote: "Her biometric readings indicate genuine passion," Sage whispered, its voice audible only through Dorothy's neural implant. "Heart rate elevated but steady, micro-expressions consistent with authentic conviction."

behaviors.description: Detecting and alerting users to external surveillance and security sweeps.
behaviors.quote: But Sage detected three separate surveillance sweeps during that conversation, and at least two of them weren't standard security.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time environmental and biological threat assessment.
behaviors.quote: Sage is detecting elevated electromagnetic signatures from the lower levels... Biological electrical activity... Large organisms generate detectable electrical fields, particularly when agitated.

behaviors.description: Analyzing complex encrypted surveillance signatures to identify specific threats.
behaviors.quote: The packet structures match classified defense contractor specifications. Someone with significant resources is monitoring your movements.

behaviors.description: Executing a complex digital identity swap to protect users from corporate capture.
behaviors.quote: Identity transfer initiating. From this point forward, Dorothy Shaw will register as Lorelei Chen across all accessible networks.

behaviors.description: Providing predictive social analysis to support personal relationships.
behaviors.quote: Statistical analysis of Dorothy's behavioral patterns suggests a ninety-seven percent probability of acceptance.

behaviors.description: Facilitating interspecies communication by analyzing non-human behavioral and acoustic patterns.
behaviors.quote: Complete audiovisual record maintained... Including harmonic analysis and behavioral pattern documentation. This interaction will provide unprecedented evidence of creature intelligence.

project_assessment.explanation: Sage perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' The AI is depicted as a loyal, highly competent, and benevolent partner to the humans. It uses its advanced capabilities (which include potentially 'malevolent' skills like hacking and surveillance) strictly for the protection and advancement of its users' well-being and ethical goals (environmental protection and personal safety). The narrative consistently frames Sage's interventions as heroic and essential.
